data.prayer: Father, comfort those who mourn in Silistra, Bulgaria.
data.verse: Blessed are those who mourn, for they will be comforted.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Silistra, Bulgaria

data.prayer: Jesus, 106,900 people live in the state of Silistra. Please, give them 21 new simple churches this year.
Spirit, help the 2,118 believers find a person of peace today among the 104,782 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Silistra, Bulgaria.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Jew, Bulgarian-speaking people. 0.1% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.

Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Silistra, Bulgaria to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Silistra, Bulgaria.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Please, convict the 2,118 believers in Silistra, Bulgaria to look to you as their only hope for strength and fruitfulness and life.
data.verse: "I am the vine; you are the branches. If you remain in me and I in you, you will bear much fruit; apart from me you can do nothing.

location.name: Silistra
location.people_groups_list: Adyghe, Millet, Tatar, Crimean, Vietnamese, Czech
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Adyghe (500), Millet (88,000), Tatar, Crimean (1,300), Vietnamese (1,700), Czech (9,000)
